question: How do I sign up as a seller?
answer: Head over to the 'Sign Up' page and select your best option. Fill in your business details, and you’re ready to start listing. For more help, check out our step-by-step tutorial video.

question: How do I list my services on your platform?
answer: Go to the seller dashboard, click 'Add,' and fill in the required details. Our AI will help optimize your listing for better visibility.

question: What are the fees for listing on this platform?
How do I choose the right category for my product?
answer: During the sign-up process, you’ll be prompted to select a product category from a dropdown menu. You can always update this later in your seller dashboard. A tutorial video is available to walk you through this as well.

question: How can I improve my product visibility?
answer: Our AI offers suggestions based on keywords, descriptions, and product tags.

question: How do I handle customer inquiries?
answer: All customer inquiries will appear in your seller dashboard. You can respond directly from there.

question: Can I track my sales performance?
answer: Yes, our analytics dashboard provides real-time insights into your sales, product views, and customer behavior.

question: How do I sign up for an account?
answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button at the top right of the homepage, fill in your details, and you're all set. We also have a tutorial video to guide you through the process.

question: How can I find products that match my preferences?
answer: You can use our AI search feature to find products based on your preferences. Just enter what you're looking for, and our AI will recommend the best matches.

question: How do I find the right product category?
answer: You can use our search bar on the homepage. If you're unsure, our AI suggestions will help narrow down the options.

question: Can I see similar products before making a decision?
answer: Yes, with sorting features you can browse similar products in a different way.

question: What should I do if I can't find what I'm looking for?
answer: You can use our advanced filters or contact our support team for assistance. We also offer AI-driven recommendations based on your search.

question: How do I get in touch with the seller?
answer: You can contact the seller directly from the product page using the 'Contact Seller' section.

question: Where can I find help if I’m stuck?
answer: If you need assistance, we have detailed tutorial videos available, or you can reach out to our customer support team.
